58c58f77-4fa0-44a8-bf89-e1523655332f.description: Verna Myers stated that “Diversity is being invited to the party. Inclusion is being asked to dance.” Universal Design for Learning (UDL) is an approach to teaching and learning that gives all students equal opportunity to succeed. Let's dance by designing inclusive digital environments. This hands-on workshop explored strategies and EdTech tools for empowering all students.
58c58f77-4fa0-44a8-bf89-e1523655332f.name: Creating the Inclusive Classroom using Universal Design Practices

issuer.summary: issued by Coppin State University Innovation, Development, Education, & Applications (IDEA) Team

entity.name: Coppin State University Innovation, Development, Education, & Applications (IDEA) Team

badge_template_activities.title: Topics covered: What is Universal Design for Learning? What is Academic Ableism? What does the Inclusive Classroom look like? EdTech Tools for the Inclusive Classroom 3 hour hands-on workshop
